documents.document: Very bad experience Room : problems with hot tube and lavatory ( water leaks ) , Tv remote was out of batteries , electricity stopped for couple times ( also for elevators )Services : Personnel entered and called numerous times my room. Sometimes without knocking. They looked well intentioned , but not too educated i think. Hotel bar looks more like a bodega on a dark side of an avenue.Location : the only positive thing : it's really close to the center
